formula.name: 4H Close
formula.code:
chart.at04hs.candle.close

/* Here it would be preferable to use another formula that does not force us to change the TF if it is changed in the strategy.
So we can use this code

tradingEngine.tradingCurrent.tradingEpisode.candle.close.value

Try it!
And you can use this in the Close Stage Target Rate node too

*/

targetSizeInQuotedAsset.name: New Target Size In Quoted Asset

formula.name: SL 20%
formula.code:
tradingEngine.tradingCurrent.position.entryTargetRate.value * 0.8

/* SL is set at 20% from entry price */
